title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 7) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations and the Principal Regulations shall be construed 

together.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic (licensing drivers) (amendment) (no 7) regulation 2020 (2) regulation principal regulation shall construed together

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations - 

“applicable period” means the period beginning on 1 March 2020 and 
ending on 31 August 2020; 

“Principal Regulations” means the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) 
Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006).
text_norm: 2 regulation - applicable period mean period beginning 1 march 2020 ending 31 august 2020 principal regulation mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006)

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: 3. Where the date of expiry of a driving licence granted in accordance with
text_raw:
3. Where the date of expiry of a driving licence granted in accordance with 
Regulation 10 of the Principal Regulations occurs during the applicable period, 
the driving licence shall be deemed to have been granted for an additional period 
of 7 months and the date of expiry shall be 7 months after the date of expiry 
specified on the licence.
text_norm: 3 date expiry driving licence granted accordance regulation 10 principal regulation occurs applicable period driving licence shall deemed granted additional period 7 month date expiry shall 7 month date expiry specified licence

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: 4. Where a driving licence, granted in accordance with Regulation 10 of the
text_raw:
4. Where a driving licence, granted in accordance with Regulation 10 of the 
Principal Regulations, is a licence to drive vehicles of more than one category 
and a category is valid to a date that occurs during the applicable period, the 
driving licence in respect of the category concerned shall be deemed to have 
been granted for an additional period of 7 months and its period of validity shall 
be extended by 7 months.
text_norm: 4 driving licence granted accordance regulation 10 principal regulation licence drive vehicle one category category valid date occurs applicable period driving licence respect category concerned shall deemed granted additional period 7 month period validity shall extended 7 month

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: 5. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 4)
text_raw:
5. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 4) 

Regulations 2020 (S.I. 127 of 2020) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [299] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal,

EAMON RYAN,

and Sport.

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2002 (S.I. No. 298 of 2002) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006) to provide an extension to the validity of certain 
driving licences during the Covid-19 pandemic. 

Driving licences that expired or are due to expire between 1 March 2020 and 31 
August 2020 have been extended for 7 months. The date of expiry for these 
licences shall be 7 months after the expiry date specified on the licence. 

The above extension applies to all the categories listed on the driving licence 
that have expired, or will expire, during the applicable period, from the date of 
expiry for each category. 

The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 4) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. 127 of 2020) are revoked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [299] 5
